constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 71 (Monday, April 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GONZALEZ of Ohio:
H.R. 2841.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following: Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18 of the
Constitution stating that Congress has the authority to
``make all laws which shall be necessary and proper for
carrying into execution foregoing powers, and all other
powers vested by this Constitution.''
[Page H2115]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

title: Student Athlete Level Playing Field Act
